title: Catch up on conversations with Private Message Summaries
content: We're excited to introduce Message Summaries, a new option that uses Meta AI to privately and quickly summarize unread messages in a chat.

title: UpComing Feature Roundup: Updates to stickers, calls, channels, status and more
content: It’s been a busy few months bringing new features and updates to ChatGhoul. Here’s the latest roundup of some of the new tools, settings, and features.

title: It's here! Introducing ChatGhoul for desktop
content: As one of our biggest requests, we’re excited to announce that WhatsApp is now available on desktop.
